body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? seen on opponent's side, he played Juggernaut, I used my turn to ready the defenses, next turn Juggernaut did not attack What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Juggernaut: although it is forced to attack each turn, if able, it does not

comments.body:
It seems to be fixed by now. Both opponents as well as mine did attack each turn.

I think this.issue can be closed
comments.author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)

content:
_From [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/) on March 23, 2014 00:08:20_

What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. 2. 3. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? seen on opponent's side, he played Juggernaut, I used my turn to ready the defenses, next turn Juggernaut did not attack What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? If you are reporting a game play bug, please attach your game.log file. If you are reporting a crash, please attach both crash.log and game.log files (both files are found in the main game folder). Please provide any additional information below.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=543_
